ThingDef.label: gas pipe
ThingDef.description: A pipe that transmits helixien gas.

ThingDef.label: subterranean gas pipe
ThingDef.description: A pipe that transmits helixien gas. This pipe is hidden from view and is protected from gas explosions. Much more expensive to build than regular pipes

ThingDef.label: gas pipe valve
ThingDef.description: Switches gas flow on/off.

ThingDef.label: gas tank
ThingDef.description: A large steel tank for gas storage. Will explode if damaged.

ThingDef.label: helixien pump
ThingDef.description: An extractor machine mounted on helixien gas geyser. Self-powered, this machine pumps out valuable gas and needs to be connected to other gas-based utilities using the pipe network.

ThingDef.label: helixien gas powered generator
ThingDef.description: Produces power by consuming helixien gas. Must be connected to a gas pipe network.

ThingDef.label: industrial helixien gas powered generator
ThingDef.description: Produces a large amount of power by consuming helixien gas. Must be connected to a gas pipe network.

ThingDef.label: helixien gas crematorium
ThingDef.description: A huge stone crematorium which vaporizes corpses with extremely high temperatures. Operates on helixien gas.
Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items. Operates on helixien gas.
ThingDef.label: helixien gas smelter
helixien gas stove
ThingDef.description: A gas-powered stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.

ThingDef.label: gas powered excavator
ThingDef.description: A deep-crust drilling excavator for extracting minerals from deep under the surface. Use a ground-penetrating scanner to detect the resources. This drill will yield stone chunks if no resources are present. Can be repositioned freely.

ThingDef.label: gas cooler
ThingDef.description: An air-cooling machine that releases cooled air around itself. Can be used to create a walk-in freezer. Cannot be adjusted and will automatically lower temperature slightly below zero.

ThingDef.label: gas heater
ThingDef.description: A device that converts helixien gas into radiated heat. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature.

ThingDef.label: gas sun lamp
ThingDef.description: An industrial lamp which lights an area brightly enough to grow crops, but consumes a medium amount of helixien gas. Automatically turns itself off at night.

ThingDef.label: helixien gas smithy
ThingDef.description: A gas-powered station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.

ThingDef.label: standing gas lamp
ThingDef.description: A gas-powered standing lamp that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Needs to be connected to the helixien gas network. Can be safely placed outdoors.

ThingDef.label: gas wall light
ThingDef.description: A gas-powered wall light that lights an area. People need light to move and work at full speed. Needs to be connected to the helixien gas network. Can be safely placed outdoors.

ThingDef.label: gas wall darklight
ThingDef.description: A gas-powered wall light that emits a dim light over a large area. People who prefer to work in darklight are happy with this light source. Needs to be connected to the helixien gas network. Can be safely placed outdoors.

ThingDef.label: gas floodlight
ThingDef.description: A gas-powered tall floodlight that lights a massive area. People need light to move and work at full speed. It doesnâ€™t shine bright enough to grow crops. Needs to be connected to the helixien gas network. Can be safely placed outdoors.

ThingDef.label: gas-powered refinery
ThingDef.description: Refines biological matter like wood or plant matter into chemfuel. Needs to be connected to the helixien gas network.

ThingDef.label: helixien gas vent
ThingDef.description: A wall-mounted vent capable of releasing toxic compounds of helixien gas into the targeted area. It drains helixien gas supply rapidly, and dissipates quickly. It needs a gas valve installed in the same network to limit the flow of gas. Helixien gas is very volatile and will travel with wind.

ThingDef.label: gas-operated pod launcher
ThingDef.description: A fueling port for launching one transport pod. Pod launchers can launch as a group - but the launchers must be placed adjacent to each other. Requires connection to a helixien gas system.
